titleStmt.title: A Full an [sic] true acount [sic] of a most barbarous and bloody murther committed by Edward Williams on the body of Mr. Hinton, at the Windsor-Castle in Green-Dragon Court, near Charing-Cross, on Thursday last with the occasion of their quarrel ... and how the coroners inquest brought it in wilful murther, and committed Mrs. Hinton to the gate-house ... for being accessary [sic] to the same.

A Full an [sic] true acount [sic] of a most barbarous and bloody murther committed by Edward Williams on the body of Mr. Hinton, at the Windsor-Castle in Green-Dragon Court, near Charing-Cross, on Thursday last with the occasion of their quarrel ... and how the coroners inquest brought it in wilful murther, and committed Mrs. Hinton to the gate-house ... for being accessary [sic] to the same.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
